snippet: The authorities here have received more than 700 tips from the public about the whereabouts of Christopher J. Dorner, the former Los Angeles police officer wanted in connection with three killings.
abstract: Authorities in Los Angeles say they have received more than 700 tips from public on whereabouts of former LAPD officer Christopher J Dorner, wanted in connection with three killings; number of calls has increased since Mayor Antonio R Villaraigosa announced $1 million reward for information leading to his arrest.
lead_paragraph: The authorities here have received more than 700 tips from the public about the whereabouts of Christopher J. Dorner, the former Los Angeles police officer wanted in connection with three killings.

headline.seo: Reward for Dorner Arrest Spurs Tips, Police Say
headline.main: Reward Spurs Many Tips on Ex-Officer
headline.print_headline: Reward Spurs Many Tips On Ex-Officer
